She likely underreports social or behavioral risk factors such as diet and alcohol use, which are important for a full assessment. How are you managing daily activities?" (to understand social context) - "Are you experiencing any other symptoms like scalp dryness, skin changes, or other vision issues?" (to identify additional deficiency signs) - Approach strategy: Ask questions gently, emphasizing understanding rather than judgment, to reduce shame.
